scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file output.yaml --s3-bucket nops-auto-remediation-east1
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yaml --stack-name nOps-Auto-Remediation-Package --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides EmailID=gagan.a@live.com
scripts.push: npm run package && npm run deploy
